Posts.EditableText: Is there an easy, built in way to bookmark a character's progress - so that if they quit then come back they can pick up where they left off?
Posts.HTML: Is there an easy, built in way to bookmark a character's progress - so that if they quit then come back they can pick up where they left off?

Posts.EditableText:
Only option that I am aware of is to issue a password that they can enter when they start the game.  Problem is, you'd have to track inventory and flags and such.

Or, they can just type save...

Posts.EditableText: you can download quest games and play them offline, there you can save. And you can save your game progress, when you play online here on textadventures.co.uk as a regiestered and logged-in user. Other website would have to install the Quest Webplayer and create their own user administration.
